data.text: This past summer was all about new records! ☀️✈️ We are proud to say that despite great challenges, we carried close to 13 million travellers between the months of June and August. 🎉 Thank you for your continuous support and for choosing WIZZ! https://t.co/dsCoWwGOnB

Ready for some stability and new opportunities in your career? Apply now to become a Cabin Crew member at WIZZ, the fastest-growing airline in Europe! Check out our open positions and apply here 👉 https://t.co/xyLnmBQvSX https://t.co/L3VcclJrVR
